entry.title: Sunday: Chance of rain showers or wet flurries. High 8. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of rain showers or wet flurries this morning and early this afternoon. Rain showers beginning this afternoon. Risk of a thunderstorm late this afternoon. Wind becoming southeast 20 km/h this morning. High 8. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 5:00 AM PDT Sunday 16 April 2023
